title: AI Assistant
subtitle: Ask me anything about FlowService
welcomeMessage: I can answer questions about how FlowService works - offers, sales, service orders, dispatching, and more.
suggestion1: How many offers do we have?
errorMessage: Sorry, I encountered an error. Please try again.
aiRestingMessage: Sorry, our AI is resting for now. Please try again later.
noApiKeysDesc: Add your OpenRouter API key to enable AI features.
tryNewResponse: Here's a different response for you.
voiceNotSupported: Voice input is not supported in this browser
ttsNotSupported: Text-to-speech is not supported in this browser
editBeforeCreating: Edit titles and priorities before creating
taskCreationError: Failed to create tasks. Please try again.
formEditHint: Form will be created as draft. You can edit it afterward.
formPreviewHint: Review the details and click Create
formSavedAsDraft: Form will be saved as draft. You can edit it afterward.
formCreationError: Failed to create form. Please try again.
helpTitle: What can I help you with?

helpCategories.dataDesc: Ask about offers, sales, contacts, tasks, projects, dispatches, and more.
helpCategories.availabilityDesc: Check who's working today, on leave, or available. Use @name to ask about specific people.
helpCategories.tasksDesc: Create tasks from descriptions, mark tasks complete, view your daily tasks.
helpCategories.navigationDesc: I can take you to any page in FlowService. Just ask!
helpCategories.issuesDesc: Report errors or problems and I'll analyze system logs to help diagnose the issue.
helpCategories.imagesDesc: Attach screenshots of FlowService, business documents, or work-related photos. I analyze only app and business content.
helpCategories.questionsDesc: Ask anything about how FlowService works.

helpExample1: "What do I have to do today?"

history.title: Chat History
history.noConversations: No conversations yet. Start a new chat!

entityForms.createFailed: Failed to create. Please try again.
entityForms.nameRequired: First name and last name are required.
entityForms.installationRequired: Installation name and contact ID are required.
entityForms.invalidContactId: Please enter a valid contact ID (number).

tour.inputDesc: Type your questions here. Ask about tasks, data, schedules, or get help navigating FlowService. I understand natural language in English and French!
tour.imageDesc: Click to attach screenshots or business documents. Drag & drop or paste (Ctrl+V) also works. I analyze FlowService screens and work-related images.
tour.voiceDesc: Click the microphone to speak your questions instead of typing. I'll transcribe and respond to what you say.
tour.mentionDesc: Type @ followed by a name to mention team members. Ask about their availability, schedule, or assign tasks to them.
tour.slashDesc: Type / to see available commands like /task, /schedule, /team, /contacts, and more for quick actions and navigation.
tour.suggestionsDesc: These suggestions change based on which page you're on. Click any to quickly ask common questions.
tour.issueDesc: Report errors or problems and I'll automatically fetch system logs to diagnose the issue. Just describe what went wrong!
tour.messagesDesc: Copy responses, listen with text-to-speech, give feedback, or regenerate answers.
tour.dataDesc: Ask about your business data: "How many offers do we have?", "Show me today's dispatches", "What's our monthly revenue?"
tour.availabilityDesc: Check team schedules: "Who is working today?", "Is @Sarah available?", "Who is on leave?"
tour.tasksDesc: Create and manage tasks: "Help me plan my day", "Mark task X as done", "What are my pending tasks?"
tour.featuresDesc: I can show live stats, analyze screenshots, detect issues, check availability, create tasks, mark tasks complete, answer questions, and navigate you anywhere in the app!

attachments.imageHint: I only analyze FlowService screenshots and business documents
attachments.analyzingImage: Analyzing image... (vision models may take longer)
attachments.uploadFailed: Failed to upload images. Please try again.

autoCreation.title: Auto-Creation
autoCreation.label: Enable auto-creation
autoCreation.description: When enabled, AI will automatically create forms, contacts, articles and other entities. When disabled, you'll see a preview and confirm before creation.

rateLimit.title: Slow down
rateLimit.perMinute: Please wait {{seconds}} seconds before sending another message.
rateLimit.perHour: You've reached the hourly limit (5 messages/hour). Please wait {{minutes}} minutes.

dispatchAssignment.dispatchNotFound: Could not find dispatch **{{dispatchNumber}}**. Please check the dispatch number.
dispatchAssignment.technicianNotFound: Could not find technician **{{technicianName}}**. Available technicians:
dispatchAssignment.sayToSchedule: Say "assign dispatch {{dispatchNumber}} to {{techName}} on {{date}}" to schedule for that date.
dispatchAssignment.alreadyAssigned: **Note:** {{techName}} is already assigned to this dispatch.
dispatchAssignment.chooseDifferentTime: Or choose a different time: "assign {{dispatchNumber}} to {{techName}} at 14:00"
dispatchAssignment.manualAssignment: Could not assign automatically. Please use the Dispatcher interface:
